mapper.select:
SELECT NOTICE_ID /*공지사항ID*/ , NOTICE_TIT /*공지사항제목*/ , VIEW_CNT /*조회수*/ , DATE_FORMAT(ENTRY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ENTRY_DATE /*등록일자*/ , ATT_FILE_YN /*첨부파일여부*/ , ENTRY_IDNO /*등록자ID*/ FROM CA_NOTICE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
AND DATE_FORMAT(ENTRY_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt}
AND NOTICE_TIT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{noticeTit},'%')
ORDER BY ENTRY_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE CA_NOTICE SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 /*조회수*/ WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId} /*공지사항ID*/
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID /*공지사항ID*/ , NOTICE_TIT /*공지사항제목*/ , NOTICE_CTNT /*공지사항내용*/ , VIEW_CNT /*조회수*/ , DATE_FORMAT(ENTRY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ENTRY_DATE /*등록일자*/ , ENTRY_IDNO /*등록자ID*/ FROM CA_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId} /*공지사항ID*/
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(NOTICE_ID), 0) + 1 AS NOTICE_ID FROM CA_NOTICE
INSERT INTO CA_NOTICE ( NOTICE_ID , NOTICE_TIT , NOTICE_CTNT , VIEW_CNT , USE_YN , ENTRY_DATE , ENTRY_IDNO , UPDAT_DATE , UPDAT_IDNO ) VALUES ( #{noticeId} , #{noticeTit} , #{noticeCtnt} , 0 , 'Y' , NOW() , #{entryIdno} , NOW() , #{updatIdno} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CA_NOTICE SET USE_YN = 'N' /*사용여부*/ , UPDAT_DATE = NOW() , UPDAT_IDNO = #{updatIdno} WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId} /*공지사항ID*/ AND USE_YN = 'Y'
